min.desc: Minimum value of the model; Set track's minimum value

max.desc: Maximum value of the model; Set track's maximum value

inner-min.desc: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

inner-max.desc: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

step.desc: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity

snap.desc: Snap on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop

track-color.desc: Color name for the track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

track-img.desc: Apply a pattern image on the track

inner-track-color.desc: Color name for the inner track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

inner-track-img.desc: Apply a pattern image on the inner track

selection-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

selection-img.desc: Apply a pattern image on the selection bar

label.desc: Popup a label when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it

switch-label-side.desc: Switch the position of the label (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

markers.desc: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model or using a custom step (when specifying a Number)

marker-labels.desc: Configure the marker labels (or show the default ones if 'true'); Array of definition Objects or Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label definition

value.desc: Value of equivalent model where to position the marker

classes.desc: CSS classes to be attributed to the marker label

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

returns.desc: Marker definition Object or directly a String for the label of the marker

value.desc: Value of equivalent model where to position the marker

classes.desc: CSS classes to be attributed to the marker label

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

examples: [ { value: 0, label: '0%' }, { value: 5, classes: 'my-class', style: { width: '24px' } } ]
val => ({ label: (10 * val) + '%', classes: 'my-class', style: { width: '24px' } })

marker-labels-class.desc: CSS class(es) to apply to the marker labels container

switch-marker-labels-side.desc: Switch the position of the marker labels (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

marker-label.desc: What should the menu display after filtering options and none are left to be displayed; Suggestion: <div>

value.desc: Equivalent model value for the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

value.desc: Equivalent model value for the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

markerMap.desc: Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label config

value.desc: Equivalent model value for the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

getStyle.desc: Get CSS style Object to apply to a marker element at respective model value; For perf reasons, use only if requested model value is not already part of markerMap

value.desc: The marker label equivalent model value

returns.desc: CSS style Object to apply to a marker element at respective model value

marker-label-group.desc: What should the menu display after filtering options and none are left to be displayed; Suggestion: <div>

value.desc: Equivalent model value for the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

markerMap.desc: Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label config

value.desc: Equivalent model value for the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the marker label

classes.desc: Required CSS classes to be applied to the marker element

getStyle.desc: Get CSS style Object to apply to a marker element at respective model value; For perf reasons, use only if requested model value is not already part of markerMap

value.desc: The marker label equivalent model value

returns.desc: CSS style Object to apply to a marker element at respective model value

change.desc: Emitted on lazy model value change (after user slides then releases the thumb)

pan.desc: Triggered when user starts panning on the component
